actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Budget.
Referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A resolution to express the sense of the Senate regarding social security and the budget surplus.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the Congress and the President should: (1) continue to work to balance the budget without counting social security trust fund surpluses; (2) continue to abide by "pay as you go" budget rules requiring that legislation increasing mandatory spending or reducing revenues must contain offsets to maintain budget neutrality; and (3) save social security first by reserving all surpluses attributable to the social security program, including interest payments.

titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the Senate regarding social security and the budget surplus.
